thread.section_title: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia | eglobaldigitalcameras.com.au
thread.title: Cristina Fairley
thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by Cristina Fairley

author: Cristina Fairley
title: Cristina Fairley
text: I paid $90 for 2-3 day shipping. It took over two weeks. Apparently eGlobal did not choose priority handling for the Australian shipping so my package languished in Melbourne for over a week, travelling as off peak mail. Very unhappy about this waste of money.
